page.title: 08RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: The area is well served by a variety of sports and social clubs,although a good deal of activity takes place in the nearby Sheerness Leisure Centre. There are, however, facilities for soccer,rugby,cricket,horse riding and an area used for hand gliding on occasions.Probably the most widely used facility is the links 9 hole golf course which is situated close behind the marshy area which is found close to the seafront. Probably one of the most widely used areas is that along the newly built seafront wall and the clifftop path above,which both give access to the beach below.Walkers of all ages make the fullest use of this area and,were the actual beach itself to be cleared up,the whole area would become very pleasant indeed.
